en: You are watching TV all the time.
zh: 你老是在看电视。

en: You are always hearing but not listening.
zh: 你总是左耳进，右耳出。

en: You are quite a man.
zh: 你挺爷们的。

en: Once you begin, you must continue.
zh: 一旦开始了，你就得坚持下去。

en: You can always ask a question in return.
zh: 你随时都可以反问一个问题。

en: What on earth are you talking about?
zh: 你到底在说什么啊？

en: You will know the truth some day.
zh: 总有一天你会知道真相的。

en: Some day you will have to reap the harvest of your own sowing.
zh: 总有一天你会自食其果的。

en: How long have you been living in Kobe, then?
zh: 那你在神户住了多久了？

en: How long have you been alienated from your family?
zh: 你跟家里人疏远多久了？

en: You are naughty.
zh: 你真淘气。

en: How much money do you want?
zh: 你想要多少钱？

en: You have some books.
zh: 你有几本书。

en: You've given me good advice.
zh: 你给了我很好的建议。

en: You are a good boy.
zh: 你是个好孩子。

en: You need not to have called me up so late at night.
zh: 你没必要这么晚给我打电话。

en: You must be tired after such a long trip.
zh: 赶了这么远的路，你一定累坏了。

en: You shouldn't talk back to your parents like that.
zh: 你不该那样跟父母顶嘴。

en: You shouldn't talk back like that.
zh: 你不该那样顶嘴。

en: You shouldn't have eaten so much ice cream.
zh: 你不该吃那么多冰淇淋的。

en: You are right in a way.
zh: 在某种程度上你是对的。

en: Have you ever been to America?
zh: 你去过美国吗？

en: You had better not work too hard.
zh: 你最好别工作得太辛苦。

en: You don't exert yourself much.
zh: 你没怎么努力啊。

en: You are too much letter-bound.
zh: 你太死扣字面意思了。

en: You cannot buy that judge.
zh: 你收买不了那个法官。

en: Have you ever been to that village?
zh: 你去过那个村子吗？

en: I wish you had told me the truth then.
zh: 我要是当时你告诉我真相就好了。

en: Are you on the committee?
zh: 你是委员会的成员吗？

en: You should have taken a chance then.
zh: 你当时应该碰碰运气的。

en: Do you know how high the television tower is?
zh: 你知道那个电视塔有多高吗？

en: You must stick to your promise.
zh: 你一定要信守诺言。

en: You're a philosopher, aren't you?
zh: 你是个哲学家，对吧？

en: You had better not associate with those men.
zh: 你最好别跟那些人混在一起。

en: You are supposed to come at 7 o'clock.
zh: 你应该是7点钟到的。

en: You have to leave home at six.
zh: 你得6点钟从家里出发。

en: You are expected to come by 5:00.
zh: 你应该在5点前到。

en: You must be at the station by 5 o'clock.
zh: 你必须在5点前赶到车站。

en: You must be here till five.
zh: 你得在这儿待到5点。

en: You look the way your father did thirty years ago.
zh: 你长得跟三十年前的你父亲一个样。

en: You must keep quiet for a few days.
zh: 你这几天得保持安静。

en: You'll be able to drive a car in a few days.
zh: 过不了几天你就能开车了。

en: You may as well have a day off, because you have been overworking those days.
zh: 反正你这阵子辛苦了，不如休息一天吧。

en: Can you do it in one day?
zh: 你能一天之内做完吗？

en: You should have refused his offer.
zh: 你当时该拒绝他的提议的。

en: You need to have breakfast.
zh: 你得吃早饭。

en: Did you leave the window open?
zh: 你是不是没关窗户？

en: You should by all means read the book.
zh: 你一定要读读这本书。

en: You should be ashamed of your folly.
zh: 你该为自己的愚蠢感到羞愧。

en: Are you doing what you think is right?
zh: 你是在做你认为正确的事吗？

en: You are the only man in the world that I can call my friend.
zh: 这世上你是我唯一能称作朋友的人。

en: It is better for you to do it now.
zh: 你最好现在就做。

en: You made the mistake on purpose, didn't you?
zh: 你是故意的，对吧？

en: You had better set some money apart for your wedding.
zh: 你最好存点钱留着结婚用。

en: You only started this job an hour ago.
zh: 你才刚干这活一个小时。

en: Which party do you belong to?
zh: 你是哪个党派的？

en: You may as well tell me all about it.
zh: 你不如把整件事都告诉我吧。

en: You may choose either of the two books.
zh: 这两本书你随便挑一本。

en: You have to report to the police at once.
zh: 你得马上报警。

en: All you have to do is wait on any customers that come to the shop.
zh: 你只要负责招待进店的客人就行了。

en: You can't go naked in this hotel.
zh: 在这家酒店里你不能光着身子。

en: You must always keep your hands clean.
zh: 你得时刻保持手部清洁。

en: You are always digging at me about my clothes.
zh: 你老是拿我的衣服挖苦我。

en: When did you begin learning German?
zh: 你什么时候开始学德语的？

en: Please go on with your story.
zh: 请继续讲你的故事吧。

en: Your story doesn't corroborate what I've heard before.
zh: 你说的和我之前听到的对不上。

en: There may be some truth in your story.
zh: 你说的可能有些是真的。

en: Your story reminded me of my younger days.
zh: 你的故事让我想起了我年轻的时候。

en: Assuming your story is true, what should I do?
zh: 假设你说的都是真的，那我该怎么办？

en: Judging from what you say, he must be a great scholar.
zh: 听你这么说，他肯定是个了不起的学者。

en: In the light of what you told us, I think we should revise our plan.
zh: 鉴于你告诉我们的情况，我觉得咱们得改改计划了。

en: I can hardly hear you.
zh: 我几乎听不见你说话。

en: Omit needless words!
zh: 把废话都删了！

en: Please give me your permanent address.
zh: 请给我你的固定地址。

en: Your parents didn't come, did they?
zh: 你父母没来，是吧？

en: Meg called you during your absence.
zh: 你不在的时候梅格给你打电话了。

en: Your situation is analogous to mine.
zh: 你的处境跟我差不多。

en: I understand your position perfectly.
zh: 我完全理解你的立场。

en: If I were in your situation, I would do the same thing.
zh: 如果我是你，我也会这么做的。

en: I don't mean to challenge your theory.
zh: 我不是要质疑你的理论。

en: I think your theory does not hold water.
zh: 我觉得你的理论站不住脚。

en: Is there anything you want that you don't have?
zh: 还有什么是你想要但没有的吗？

en: Your summary is not up to par.
zh: 你的总结不达标。

en: He came out shooting, same as you said he would.
zh: 就像你说的，他一出来就开始射击。

en: Your prophecy has come true.
zh: 你的预言成真了。

en: Your friendship is most precious to me.
zh: 你的友谊对我来说非常珍贵。

en: I admire you for your courage.
zh: 我很佩服你的勇气。

en: I admire your courage.
zh: 我佩服你的勇气。

en: I admire your brave deed.
zh: 我佩服你的英勇行为。

en: I rest on your promise.
zh: 我就指望你的承诺了。

en: I'll keep your problems in mind.
zh: 我会把你的问题放在心上的。

en: I see no analogy between your problem and mine.
zh: 我看不出你的问题和我的有什么相似之处。

en: You have lovely eyes, don't you?
zh: 你的眼睛很漂亮，不是吗？

en: Your eyes are red with crying.
zh: 你的眼睛都哭红了。

en: Where are your eyes?
zh: 你眼睛看哪儿呢？

en: Your eyes have a certain magnetism.
zh: 你的眼睛很有魅力。

en: Your driver's license has expired.
zh: 你的驾照过期了。

en: I will sell the boat in accordance with your orders.
zh: 我会按照你的要求把船卖掉。

en: Are you sure you want to put your life in her hands?
zh: 你确定要把命交给她吗？

en: Write your name in capitals.
zh: 用大写字母写你的名字。

en: I know your name.
zh: 我知道你的名字。

en: Didn't you hear your name called?
zh: 你没听到有人叫你的名字吗？

en: Your daughter is not a child anymore.
zh: 你女儿已经不是小孩子了。

en: I admire your ignorance.
zh: 我真佩服你的无知。

en: I have no interest in putting my money into your dreams.
zh: 我没兴趣把钱投在你的梦想上。

en: This business plan of yours seems almost too optimistic. All I can say is I hope it's more than just wishful thinking.
zh: 你这个商业计划书看起来有点过于乐观了。我只能说，希望这不只是你在异想天开。

en: Your dream will come true some day.
zh: 你的梦想总有一天会实现的。

en: It won't be long before your dream comes true.
zh: 你的梦想很快就会实现。

en: The day is sure to come when your dream will come true.
zh: 你的梦想总会有实现的那一天。

en: The day will surely come when your dream will come true.
zh: 那一天肯定会来的，你的梦想一定会实现。

en: The time will come when your dream will come true.
zh: 你的梦想总有成真的那一刻。

en: You have a regular pulse.
zh: 你的脉搏很正常。

en: Tell me about your program for the future.
zh: 跟我说说你未来的计划吧。

en: Your comic books are on the shelf.
zh: 你的漫画书在架子上。

en: How pretty your sister is!
zh: 你妹妹长得真漂亮！

en: What has become of your sister?
zh: 你妹妹后来怎么样了？

en: When did your sister leave Tokyo for London?
zh: 你妹妹什么时候离开东京去伦敦的？

en: What grade is your sister in?
zh: 你妹妹上几年级了？

en: What's your real purpose?
zh: 你的真实目的是什么？

en: Your book is double the size of mine.
zh: 你的书比我的大一倍。

en: Your book is on the desk.
zh: 你的书在桌子上。

en: I will be your guarantor.
zh: 我来做你的担保人。

en: Better to get advice from your lawyer.
zh: 你最好听听律师的建议。

en: I am sick of your complaint.
zh: 我听够了你的抱怨。

en: Your allotment is $20.
zh: 你的份额是20美元。

en: Your dress is unsuitable for the occasion.
zh: 你的衣服不适合这个场合。

en: Your room is out of order.
zh: 你的房间太乱了。

en: Your room is twice the size of mine.
zh: 你的房间是我的两倍大。

en: Your room must always be kept clean.
zh: 你的房间必须随时保持整洁。

en: You have been beaten. Give in!
zh: 你输了。认输吧！

en: Your father's supporters are not limited to his friends.
zh: 支持你父亲的人不只有他的朋友。

en: Please give my regards to your father.
zh: 请代我向你父亲问好。

en: Your father went through all that trouble for your sake.
zh: 你父亲费了那么多周折都是为了你。

en: I'm tired of your complaints.
zh: 我烦透了你的抱怨。

en: Your wrongdoing is a disgrace to our school.
zh: 你的所作所为是学校的耻辱。

en: Your smile always makes me happy.
zh: 你的笑容总能让我开心。

en: Your estimation of him is a little high, to say the least.
zh: 说真的，你对他评价有点过高了。

en: It's your move.
zh: 该你了。

en: Your hair is too long.
zh: 你的头发太长了。

en: Your hair really does look untidy.
zh: 你的头发看着确实挺乱的。

en: Your remarks are off the point.
zh: 你这话没说到点子上。

en: Your problem is similar to mine.
zh: 你的问题和我差不多。

en: You should know better at your age.
zh: 你都这个年纪了，该懂点事了。

en: At your age, I would think so, too.
zh: 我要是在你这个年纪，也会这么想。

en: At your age, you ought to know better.
zh: 你都这把年纪了，早该懂事了。

en: Tell me about your daily life.
zh: 跟我说说你的日常生活吧。

en: At your age you ought to support yourself.
zh: 在你这个年纪，你应该能自食其力了。

en: Your second button is coming off.
zh: 你第二个扣子快掉了。

en: You may read whichever book you like.
zh: 你想看哪本书都行。

en: Without your consent, nothing can be done about it.
zh: 没有你的同意，这事办不成。

en: Your motive was admirable, but your action was not.
zh: 你的出发点是好的，但做法不对。

en: Check your answers with his.
zh: 把你的答案跟他核对一下。

en: Check your answer with his.
zh: 把你的答案跟他核对一下。

en: Compare your answers with the teacher's.
zh: 把你的答案跟老师的对比一下。

en: Compare your answer with Tom's.
zh: 把你的答案跟汤姆的对比一下。

en: Your answer is to the point.
zh: 你的回答说到点子上了。

en: Your answer isn't correct. Try again.
zh: 你的答案不对，再试一次。

en: Your answer is right.
zh: 你的答案是对的。

en: Your answer is anything but perfect.
zh: 你的答案一点都不完美。

en: Your answer is wrong.
zh: 你的答案错了。

en: Your answer is far from perfect.
zh: 你的答案离完美还差得远。

en: Your answer is far from satisfactory.
zh: 你的答案远不能让人满意。

en: If your answer is correct, it follows that mine is wrong.
zh: 如果你的答案是对的，那我的就是错的。

en: I think your answer is correct.
zh: 我觉得你的答案是对的。

en: It doesn't matter whether your answer is right or wrong.
zh: 你的答案对错都无所谓。

en: Your efforts will soon pay off.
zh: 你的努力很快就会有回报的。

en: I'm sure your efforts will result in success.
zh: 我肯定你的努力会成功的。

en: Your efforts will pay off one day.
zh: 你的努力总有一天会有回报的。

en: Your efforts will bear fruit someday.
zh: 你的努力总有一天会开花结果的。

en: Your effort will be rewarded in the long run.
zh: 从长远来看，你的努力会有回报的。

en: Your efforts will be rewarded in the long run.
zh: 从长远来看，你的努力会有回报的。

en: I hope your efforts will bear fruit.
zh: 我希望你的努力能有所收获。

en: Come and see me when it is convenient for you.
zh: 你方便的时候过来找我吧。

en: You can come and see me whenever it's convenient for you.
zh: 你随时方便随时过来找我。

en: I forget your telephone number.
zh: 我把你的电话号码给忘了。

en: Had I known your telephone number, I would have called you.
zh: 要是我知道你的电话号码，我就给你打电话了。

en: May I use your phone?
zh: 我能用一下你的电话吗？

en: Your suggestion came up at the meeting.
zh: 会上提到了你的建议。

en: His proposal is out of the question.
zh: 他的提议根本不可能。

en: Your suggestion amounts to an order.
zh: 你的建议简直就是命令。

en: Your suggestion will be rejected by the teacher.
zh: 老师会拒绝你的建议的。

en: Your proposal is a bit extreme.
zh: 你的提议有点极端。

en: Your suggestion is of no practical use.
zh: 你的建议没什么实际用处。

en: I can't agree to your proposal on the ground that it is not fair and reasonable.
zh: 我不能同意你的提议，因为这不公平也不合理。

en: I am in favor of your proposal.
zh: 我赞成你的提议。

en: I cannot agree to your proposal.
zh: 我没法同意你的提议。

en: There is certain to be some opposition to your suggestion.
zh: 肯定会有人反对你的建议。

en: I don't mean to object to your proposal.
zh: 我并不是想反对你的提议。

en: Bring your brother with you.
zh: 把你兄弟也带上。

en: Is there no alternative to what you propose?
zh: 除了你的提议，就没有别的选择了吗？

en: Your brother said you'd gone to Paris.
zh: 你兄弟说你已经去巴黎了。

en: You'll be paid according to the amount of work you do.
zh: 工资会根据你的工作量来发。

en: How many schools are there in your city?
zh: 你们城市有多少所学校？

en: Can I count on your loyalty?
zh: 我能指望你的忠诚吗？

en: I'll act on your advice.
zh: 我会按你的建议去做。

en: If only I had taken your advice.
zh: 要是我听了你的建议就好了。

en: If it were not for your advice, I would be at a loss.
zh: 要不是因为你的建议，我真不知道该怎么办了。

en: Without your advice, I would have been robbed of my bag.
zh: 要不是听了你的建议，我的包就被抢了。

en: If it had not been for your advice, I would have failed.
zh: 要不是因为你的建议，我就失败了。

en: Your idea leaves nothing to be desired.
zh: 你的主意简直完美。

en: It's none of your business.
zh: 不关你的事。

en: Mind your own business!
zh: 管好你自己的事！

en: When is your birthday?
zh: 你生日是什么时候？

en: I will give you a bicycle for your birthday.
zh: 我要送你一辆自行车当生日礼物。

en: Your birthday is drawing near.
zh: 你生日快到了。

en: You shall have a bicycle for your birthday.
zh: 你过生日会有一辆自行车的。

en: I'll find someone to fill in for you.
zh: 我会找个人来替你。

en: Aren't you being very rude?
zh: 你是不是有点太没礼貌了？

en: There's no room for excuses when it comes to your negligence, is there?
zh: 对于你的疏忽，你是没法找借口的，对吧？

en: Your son has come of age.
zh: 你儿子已经成年了。

en: Your son took part in the student movement, I hear.
zh: 听说你儿子参加学生运动了。

en: Is this your son, Betty?
zh: 贝蒂，这是你儿子吗？

en: I cannot accept your gift.
zh: 我不能收你的礼物。

en: I'm fed up with your constant complaining.
zh: 我受够了你没完没了的抱怨。

en: What's your major field?
zh: 你的专业是什么？

en: Your explanation won't wash; it's too improbable to be true.
zh: 你的解释行不通，太假了。

en: Your explanation sounds plausible, but it just doesn't hold water.
zh: 你的解释听着像那么回事，但其实根本站不住脚。

en: Go back to your seat.
zh: 回你座位去。

en: You may have good reason to think that your youth is over.
zh: 你可能有充分的理由觉得自己的青春已经不在了。

en: I can hear you, but I can't see you.
zh: 我能听到你说话，但看不见你。

en: Your voice carries well.
zh: 你的声音穿透力挺强的。

en: I don't for a moment doubt your honesty.
zh: 我从来没怀疑过你的为人。

en: Your policy is mistaken.
zh: 你的政策不对。

en: Your marks were well below average this term.
zh: 你这学期的成绩远低于平均水平。

en: I was glad to hear of your success.
zh: 听说你成功了，我真为你高兴。

en: I'm sure of your success.
zh: 我肯定你会成功的。

en: Your success excites my envy.
zh: 你的成功真让我羡慕。

en: Your success will largely depend upon how you will make good use of your opportunity.
zh: 你的成功很大程度上取决于你如何利用机会。

en: Your success depends upon whether you work hard or not.
zh: 你能不能成功取决于你努不努力。

en: Your success depends on whether you pass the STEP examination or not.
zh: 你能不能成功取决于你能不能通过STEP考试。

en: I am glad to hear of your success.
zh: 听说你成功了，我很开心。

en: Which of your parents do you take after in character?
zh: 你的性格更像你爸爸还是你妈妈？

en: You're wide of the mark.
zh: 你猜得太离谱了。

en: Your guess is entirely off the mark.
zh: 你完全猜错了。

en: Your philosophy of life varies from mine.
zh: 咱俩的人生观不一样。

en: You have no one but yourself to blame.
zh: 这只能怪你自己。

en: Your loving friend.
zh: 你亲爱的朋友。

en: With reference to your request, I will support.
zh: 关于你的请求，我会支持的。

en: I read your new book with real delight.
zh: 读你的新书让我感到非常愉快。

en: Your new dress becomes you very well.
zh: 你的新裙子很衬你。

en: Let me put down your new phone number in my notebook.
zh: 我把你的新号码记在笔记本上。

en: Your behavior is creating a lot of problems.
zh: 你的行为惹了不少麻烦。

en: I am far from pleased with your behavior.
zh: 我对你的表现一点都不满意。

en: What was it that caused you to change your mind?
zh: 是什么让你改变主意的？

en: I didn't mean to hurt you.
zh: 我没想伤害你。

en: As you make your bed, you must lie on it.
zh: 自作自受。

en: Your principles are not consistent with your actions.
zh: 你言行不一。

en: I don't like your taste in color.
zh: 我不喜欢你对颜色的品味。

en: We will make an exception of your case.
zh: 你的情况我们可以破例。

en: The button on your coat is coming off.
zh: 你外套上的扣子快掉了。

en: I like the way you smile.
zh: 我喜欢你笑的样子。

en: Let's have a serious talk about your future.
zh: 我们认真谈谈你的未来吧。

en: I hope you have a happy future ahead of you.
zh: 我希望你以后能过得幸福。

en: Your advice has helped me see the light regarding my future.
zh: 你的建议帮我看清了未来的路。

en: Your advice is always helpful to me.
zh: 你的建议对我一直很有帮助。

en: I expect your help.
zh: 我指望你能帮我。

en: I don't need your help.
zh: 我不需要你帮忙。

en: But for your help, I should have failed.
zh: 要不是你帮忙，我肯定失败了。

en: Without your help, we wouldn't be able to carry out our plan.
zh: 没有你的帮助，我们没法执行计划。

en: He is equal to the task.
zh: 他能胜任这项任务。

en: We'll start whenever you are ready.
zh: 你准备好我们就开始。

en: We will exempt you from attending.
zh: 你可以不用参加。

en: When will your assignment be completed?
zh: 你的作业什么时候能写完？

en: The ice will give under your weight.
zh: 冰会被你踩塌的。

en: Write your address here.
zh: 在这儿写你的地址。

en: Your income is about twice as large as mine.
zh: 你的收入大概是我的两倍。

en: Your income is about twice as large as mine is.
zh: 你的收入大概是我的两倍。

en: Your income is three times larger than mine.
zh: 你的收入是我的三倍。

en: Your attendance at classes was irregular.
zh: 你上课出勤很不规律。

en: I'll miss your cooking.
zh: 我会想念你做的菜。

en: This happened prior to receiving your letter.
zh: 这事发生在你来信之前。

en: I received your letter yesterday.
zh: 我昨天收到你的信了。

en: Your letter made me happy.
zh: 你的来信让我很高兴。

en: What position do you hold?
zh: 你是什么职位？

en: Are your hands clean?
zh: 你手干净吗？

en: Your argument is not any more convincing than that of my stubborn father.
zh: 你的论点和我那固执的老爸一样没说服力。

en: Please lend me your car.
zh: 请把车借我用用。

en: Pull your car out a bit, I can't back my car out.
zh: 把你车往外挪点，我倒不出来。

en: Would you mind lending me your car?
zh: 能借下你的车吗？

en: Your car makes too much noise. You should have it looked at.
zh: 你的车响声太大了，该去检查一下了。

en: Give me a lift in your car.
zh: 让我搭个便车吧。

en: Compared with yours, my car is small.
zh: 跟你的比起来，我的车很小。

en: What have you done with your car?
zh: 你的车怎么处理了？

en: It is important that you attach your photo to the application form.
zh: 记得在申请表上贴上你的照片。

en: May I take your picture?
zh: 能给你拍张照吗？

en: I would like your picture.
zh: 我想要你的照片。

en: Your question does not bear on the subject under discussion.
zh: 你的问题跟讨论的主题无关。

en: Your question is not relevant to the subject.
zh: 你的问题跟这个主题没关系。

en: Your questions were too direct.
zh: 你的问题问得太直接了。

en: Your question is hard for me to answer.
zh: 你的问题我很难回答。

en: You have Jim to thank for your failure.
zh: 你的失败全拜吉姆所赐。

en: Will you lend me your dictionary?
zh: 能把字典借我一下吗？

en: May I borrow your dictionary?
zh: 我能借一下你的字典吗？

en: Look up the definition of 'guy' in your dictionary.
zh: 在你字典里查查 'guy' 的定义。

en: Look up the words in your dictionary.
zh: 查查你字典里的这些词。

en: Could you lend me your bicycle for a couple of days?
zh: 自行车能借我骑两天吗？

en: Your bicycle is similar to mine.
zh: 你的自行车跟我那辆挺像的。

en: Your bike is better than mine.
zh: 你的自行车比我的好。

en: Is your watch correct?
zh: 你的表准吗？

en: Your watch seems to be very valuable.
zh: 你的表看起来很值钱。

en: Your watch is similar to mine in shape and color.
zh: 你的表跟我的在形状和颜色上挺像的。

en: Your watch is more expensive than mine.
zh: 你的表比我的贵。

en: Your watch is ten minutes slow.
zh: 你的表慢了十分钟。

en: What time is it by your watch?
zh: 你的表几点了？

en: Where are your things?
zh: 你的东西在哪儿？

en: It is not my part to meddle in your affairs.
zh: 我不该插手你的闲事。

en: Your examination results are excellent.
zh: 你的考试成绩非常优秀。

en: Your point may be a little off target, but it certainly is close.
zh: 你的观点可能有点偏差，但已经很接近了。

en: Just follow your heart.
zh: 随心而行吧。

en: The population of your city is about five times as large as that of my town.
zh: 你们城市的人口大概是我们镇的五倍。

en: Your sister enjoys watching sumo wrestling on TV.
zh: 你姐姐挺喜欢在电视上看相扑的。

en: Your sister's as beautiful as ever.
zh: 你姐姐还是那么漂亮。

en: I am only too glad to help you with your work.
zh: 我很乐意帮你的忙。

en: I think your work is all right.
zh: 我觉得你的工作做得还行。

en: Your work is below average.
zh: 你的工作表现低于平均水平。

en: Your work didn't come up to our expectations.
zh: 你的表现没达到我们的预期。

en: Your work comes short of the expected standard.
zh: 你的工作还没达到要求的标准。

en: What do you do?
zh: 你是做什么工作的？

en: Your work has greatly improved.
zh: 你的工作大有长进。

en: How is your work coming along?
zh: 你的工作进展得怎么样了？

en: Don't take it amiss if I criticize your work.
zh: 我要是批评你的工作，你别往心里去。

en: When your business gets rolling we'll talk about an increase.
zh: 等你生意步入正轨了，咱们再谈加薪的事。

en: May we accompany you on your walk?
zh: 我们能陪你一起散步吗？

en: I left your umbrella in the bus.
zh: 我把你的伞落在公交车上了。

en: All the compositions were good except yours.
zh: 除了你的，大家的作文写得都挺好。

en: Compare your composition with the example.
zh: 把你的作文跟范文比比。

en: Your English composition is above the average.
zh: 你的英语作文在平均水平以上。

en: Your composition was good except for the spelling.
zh: 你的作文写得不错，就是拼写有点问题。

en: Your composition leaves nothing to be desired.
zh: 你的作文写得完美无缺。

en: Your composition is very good, and it has few mistakes.
zh: 你的作文很好，几乎没什么错误。

en: Your composition is as good as ever.
zh: 你的作文还是一如既往地棒。

en: Your composition is perfect except for a few mistakes.
zh: 除了几个小错误，你的作文很完美。

en: Your composition is free from all grammatical mistakes.
zh: 你的作文一点语法错误都没有。

en: There are few mistakes in your composition.
zh: 你的作文里没什么错。

en: Your essay has some mistakes, but as a whole it is very good.
zh: 你的文章有些错误，但整体看非常好。

en: Your composition has a few mistakes.
zh: 你的作文有几个小错误。

en: When talking about your last results, it is dependent on the last examination.
zh: 说到你上次的成绩，那得看最后那场考试。

en: Explain to him the difficult situation you are in.
zh: 跟他解释一下你现在的难处。

en: The trouble with you is that you talk too much.
zh: 你的毛病就是话太多。

en: What you have said doesn't apply to you.
zh: 你说的这些并不适用于你自己。

en: Do you eat rice in your country?
zh: 你们国家的人吃米饭吗？

en: You should come early in order for him to read your manuscript before your speech.
zh: 你应该早点来，好让他演讲前先看看你的稿子。

en: Your conduct is perfectly legal.
zh: 你的行为完全合法。

en: Your conduct doesn't become a gentleman.
zh: 你的行为一点都不绅士。

en: Your behavior is in conflict with your principles.
zh: 你的行为违背了你的原则。

en: Your behavior is quite out of place.
zh: 你的举止很不合时宜。

en: Your behavior is too extraordinary.
zh: 你的行为太反常了。

en: Your behavior admits of no excuse.
zh: 你的行为无可辩解。

en: Your behavior leaves much to be desired.
zh: 你的表现还有待改进。

en: You are not consistent in your actions.
zh: 你做起事来前后不一。

en: Your action has offended his dignity.
zh: 你这样做伤了他的尊严。

en: Your conduct is beyond bearing.
zh: 你的行为真让人没法忍。

en: What you did brought disgrace on the whole class.
zh: 你做的这事儿让全班都跟着丢脸。

en: I am ashamed of your conduct.
zh: 我真替你的这种行为感到丢人。

en: I cannot support your conduct.
zh: 我没法认同你这种做法。

en: I can't decide unless you tell me your plan.
zh: 除非你把计划告诉我，不然我没法做决定。

en: Show me a fact which supports your idea.
zh: 拿点事实来证明你的想法吧。

en: Please sum up your idea.
zh: 简单概括一下你的想法吧。

en: Express your idea clearly.
zh: 把你的想法说清楚点儿。

en: We have decided to adopt your idea.
zh: 我们决定用你的主意了。

en: Your ideas are different from mine.
zh: 你的想法跟我不太一样。

en: Your way of thinking is quite distinct from mine.
zh: 你的思路跟我的完全不一样。

en: Your guess is almost right.
zh: 你猜得八九不离十了。

en: We all consider that your idea is impractical.
zh: 我们都觉得你这主意不太靠谱。

en: Your idea is absolutely impossible.
zh: 你这主意绝对行不通。

en: Your ideas are ahead of the times.
zh: 你的想法太超前了。

en: Your idea seems to be similar to mine.
zh: 你的想法好像跟我差不多。

en: Your view is too optimistic.
zh: 你看得也太乐观了。

en: Your ideas are quite old fashioned.
zh: 你的想法挺过时的。

en: Your thoughts are of no significance at all.
zh: 你想的这些根本没什么意义。

en: Your idea differs entirely from mine.
zh: 你的想法跟我完全不一样。

en: I liked your idea and adopted it.
zh: 我觉得你这主意挺好，就采纳了。

en: I envy you your luck.
zh: 真羡慕你运气这么好。

en: You may invite any person you like.
zh: 你想请谁都行。

en: Choose your favorite racket.
zh: 挑个你最喜欢的球拍吧。

en: Do as you like.
zh: 按你喜欢的做吧。

en: You may act however you wish.
zh: 你想怎么做都行。

en: Make your choice.
zh: 选一个吧。

en: You have the freedom to travel wherever you like.
zh: 你想去哪儿旅游都随你，你有这个自由。

en: I am amazed at your audacity.
zh: 你胆子这么大，真让我吃惊。

en: You should make the best of your limited time.
zh: 你应该好好利用有限的时间。

en: Your words are as good as violence.
zh: 你这话简直就跟暴力没什么两样。

en: Your remark amounts almost to insult.
zh: 你这话听起来简直就是在侮辱人。

en: Judging from what you say, he may succeed.
zh: 听你这么说，他没准儿能成功。

en: I know what you mean.
zh: 我知道你的意思。

en: What you are saying does not make sense.
zh: 你说的这些根本没道理。

en: What you are saying is equal to "no", isn't it?
zh: 你这话的意思其实就是‘不行’，对吧？

en: What you are saying is nothing but building a castle in the air.
zh: 你说的这些简直就是空中楼阁。

en: I don't quite follow you.
zh: 我没太听懂你的意思。

en: You're just being diplomatic.
zh: 你这就是在说客套话。

en: You are not consistent.
zh: 你说话前后不一致。

en: It appears to me that you are right.
zh: 我觉得你是对的。

en: She cannot have understood what you said.
zh: 她不可能听懂了你刚才说的话。

en: I accept what you say to some extent.
zh: 你说的话，我某种程度上是认同的。

en: What you said does not apply to this case.
zh: 你说的这些并不适用于这个情况。

en: What you said is also true of this case.
zh: 你说的这点在这个案例里也成立。

en: What you say is neither here nor there.
zh: 你说这些根本不挨着。

en: Admitting what you say, I cannot agree with you.
zh: 虽然我承认你说的，但我还是没法同意你的看法。

en: I think you're right.
zh: 我觉得你是对的。

en: Admitting what you say, I still think you are wrong.
zh: 就算承认你说的，我还是觉得你错了。

en: Admitting what you say, I still think that you were wrong.
zh: 虽然你说得有理，但我还是觉得你错了。

en: I admit that what you say is true, but I don't like the way you say it.
zh: 我承认你说的是真的，但我不喜欢你说话的语气。

en: Though I admit what you say, I still think you are wrong.
zh: 虽然我承认你说的，但我还是觉得你错了。

en: Admitting what you say, I still think I am right.
zh: 虽然你说得对，但我还是觉得我是对的。

en: While I accept what you say, I still think I'm right.
zh: 虽然我接受你的说法，但我还是觉得我是对的。

en: Admitting what you say, I still think you are mistaken.
zh: 虽然你说得对，但我还是觉得你弄错了。

en: Admitting what you say, I still think you are in the wrong.
zh: 虽然你说的有道理，但我还是觉得错的是你。

en: I can not make out at all what you say.
zh: 我完全听不懂你在说什么。

en: You may be right.
zh: 你可能是对的。

en: What you say is right.
zh: 你说的没错。

en: I find it difficult to believe.
zh: 我觉得很难相信。

en: Your words must correspond with your actions.
zh: 你得言行一致。

en: Aren't you pushing it too far?
zh: 你是不是有点过分了？

en: While I see what you say, I can't accept your offer.
zh: 虽然我明白你的意思，但我不能接受你的提议。

en: What you say is quite wide of the mark.
zh: 你说的完全不着边际。

en: You are off the point.
zh: 你跑题了。

en: All that you say is perfectly correct.
zh: 你说的完全正确。

en: What you say is usually true.
zh: 你说的通常都是真的。

en: What you say is quite different from what I heard from him.
zh: 你说的和我从他那儿听到的完全不一样。

en: I can't see what you mean.
zh: 我不明白你的意思。

en: You should pay more attention to what you say.
zh: 你说话应该注意点。

en: There is much truth in what you say.
zh: 你说的很有道理。

en: I can make nothing of what you do or say.
zh: 我完全看不懂你在做什么，也听不懂你在说什么。

en: If what you say is true, it follows that he has an alibi.
zh: 如果你说的属实，那他就有不在场证明了。

en: I don't follow.
zh: 我没听懂。

en: Your study will bear fruit.
zh: 你的研究会有成果的。

en: Your dog may be really depressed.
zh: 你的狗可能真的有点抑郁。

en: What's become of your dog?
zh: 你的狗怎么了？

en: I have been anxious about your health.
zh: 我一直挺担心你的身体。

en: I envy your good health.
zh: 我真羡慕你身体这么好。

en: Your conclusion is highly arguable.
zh: 你的结论很有争议。

en: Your decision is open to some debate.
zh: 你的决定还有待商榷。

en: You can go or stay, as you wish.
zh: 你想走想留都随你。

en: I'm sorry to upset your plans.
zh: 抱歉打乱了你的计划。

en: I will go along with your plan.
zh: 我会配合你的计划。

en: Your plan is of no earthly use.
zh: 你的计划一点用都没有。

en: Your scheme is like a house built on the sand.
zh: 你的方案就像沙上建塔，根基不牢。

en: Your plan is bound to fail.
zh: 你的计划肯定会失败。

en: I'm afraid your plan will not work.
zh: 我恐怕你的计划行不通。

en: Tell me the object of your plan.
zh: 告诉我你这个计划的目标是什么。

en: Your plan seems better than mine.
zh: 你的计划看起来比我的好。

en: I approve of your plan.
zh: 我赞成你的计划。

en: Tell me about your plan.
zh: 跟我说说你的计划。

en: Admittedly your plan makes sense, but I still think it will be very hard to carry out.
zh: 诚然你的计划有道理，但我还是觉得很难执行。

en: There is a big hole in your stocking.
zh: 你的长袜破了个大洞。

en: Your shoes do not go with the suit.
zh: 你的鞋子和这身西装不搭。

en: Your shoes are here. Where are mine?
zh: 你的鞋在这儿。我的呢？

en: Your shoes are here.
zh: 你的鞋在这儿。

en: I'm sick of listening to your complaints.
zh: 我听腻了你的抱怨。

en: I cannot help laughing at your folly.
zh: 我忍不住笑你太傻了。

en: You can read any book that interests you.
zh: 你感兴趣的书随便看。

en: It is not wise to put your money on a horse.
zh: 赌马可不是什么明智的选择。

en: Had it not been for your cooperation, I could not have finished the work in time.
zh: 要不是你配合，我没法按时完工。

en: Do you know what you're asking?
zh: 你知不知道你在提什么要求？

en: I forbid you to smoke.
zh: 我不准你抽烟。

en: His argument is more radical than yours.
zh: 他的观点比你的更激进。

en: Your poor memory is due to poor listening habits.
zh: 你记性不好是因为你听得不认真。

en: The sooner you return, the happier your father will be.
zh: 你回来得越早，你爸就越高兴。

en: Leave your desk as it is.
zh: 你的书桌就这样放着吧，别动它。

en: I think your basic theory is wrong.
zh: 我觉得你的基本理论是错的。

en: Your wish will come true in the near future.
zh: 你的愿望很快就能实现。

en: What's your wish?
zh: 你的愿望是什么？

en: Your eyes remind me of stars.
zh: 你的眼睛让我想起了星星。

en: That is no business of yours.
zh: 那不关你的事。

en: Where is your school?
zh: 你们学校在哪儿？

en: How many pupils are there in your school?
zh: 你们学校有多少学生？

en: Your singing puts professional singers to shame.
zh: 你唱得让专业歌手都自愧不如。

en: Your house needs repairing.
zh: 你家房子该修修了。

en: Your house is three times as large as mine.
zh: 你家房子是我家的三倍大。

en: What direction does your house face?
zh: 你家房子朝哪边？

en: Make a sketch of your house.
zh: 给你家画个草图吧。

en: I wish I could live near your house.
zh: 我真想住得离你家近点。

en: How many rooms are there in your house?
zh: 你家有几间房？

en: Let's meet halfway between your house and mine.
zh: 咱们在两家中间碰面吧。

en: How far is it from your house to the park?
zh: 从你家到公园有多远？

en: Let's discuss your love problems on the way back from school.
zh: 咱们在放学回家的路上聊聊你的感情问题。

en: The time has come for you to play your trump card.
zh: 该是你亮出王牌的时候了。

en: It is surprising that your wife should object.
zh: 真没想到你老婆竟然会反对。

en: Can I use your pencil?
zh: 我能用一下你的铅笔吗？

en: Your pencils need sharpening.
zh: 你的铅笔该削一削了。

en: You burnt a hole in my coat with your cigarette.
zh: 你的烟头把我的外套烫了个洞。

en: Your speech will be recorded in history.
zh: 你的演讲将被载入史册。

en: I count on your help.
zh: 我就全指望你帮忙了。

en: If it had not been for your aid, I would not have succeeded in my business.
zh: 要不是你帮忙，我的生意成不了。

en: Without your assistance I would have failed.
zh: 没你帮忙的话，我就失败了。

en: If it had not been for your support, he would have failed in business.
zh: 要不是你支持，他的生意早就垮了。

en: Your English composition leaves nothing to be desired.
zh: 你的英语作文写得没得挑。

en: Your English leaves nothing to be desired.
zh: 你的英语好得没得挑。

en: Your English is improving.
zh: 你的英语在进步。

en: Your English is perfect.
zh: 你的英语太完美了。

en: I think your English has improved a lot.
zh: 我觉得你的英语进步很大。

en: Your English has improved a lot.
zh: 你的英语进步很大。

en: Your English has made gradual progress.
zh: 你的英语在一点点进步。

en: You are now quite at home in English.
zh: 你现在的英语说得很溜。

en: Your method of teaching English is absurd.
zh: 你教英语的方法太荒唐了。

en: I'm amazed at your fluency in English.
zh: 你的英语说得这么流利，真让我吃惊。

en: Every little thing you say gets on my nerves.
zh: 你说的每一句话都让我心烦。

en: I want your opinion.
zh: 我想听听你的意见。

en: Don't press your opinions on me.
zh: 别把你的观点强加给我。

en: Your opinion is similar to mine.
zh: 你的想法跟我差不多。

en: Your opinion is far different from mine.
zh: 你的想法跟我差得太远了。

en: Your opinion is very constructive.
zh: 你的建议挺有建设性的。

en: I agree with some of your opinions.
zh: 我同意你的一些看法。

en: Are your opinions representative of those of the other students?
zh: 你的观点能代表其他学生吗？

en: Your opinion is off the mark. That's plain to anyone.
zh: 你的看法完全不着边际，谁都能看出来。

en: Granting that favor is out of the question.
zh: 帮这个忙根本不可能。

en: Do you think that you can put your idea into practice?
zh: 你觉得你的想法能付诸实践吗？

en: Your idea sounds like a good one.
zh: 你的主意听起来不错。

en: It all depends how you handle it.
zh: 这全看你打算怎么处理了。

en: I'm annoyed at your selfishness.
zh: 我对你的自私感到很烦。

en: Do the first example in your workbook.
zh: 做一下练习册里的第一个例题。

en: I'll study your report.
zh: 我会研究一下你的报告。

en: Your report is pretty good, if not excellent.
zh: 你的报告就算称不上优秀，也已经挺不错的了。

en: There are several spelling errors in your essay.
zh: 你的作文里有几个拼写错误。

en: I was disappointed with your paper.
zh: 我对你的论文挺失望的。

en: If it had not been for your raincoat, I would have been drenched to the skin.
zh: 要不是你的雨衣，我肯定被淋透了。

en: Had it not been for your raincoat, I would have been drenched to the skin.
zh: 要不是因为你的雨衣，我早就淋成落汤鸡了。

en: Will you give me your radio for my bicycle?
zh: 你想用你的收音机换我的自行车吗？

en: Your selfishness will lose you your friends.
zh: 你的自私会让你失去朋友的。

en: Your sense of humor is beginning to exert itself.
zh: 你的幽默感开始发挥作用了。

en: I entirely approve of what you say.
zh: 我完全赞成你说的。

en: I am losing my patience with you.
zh: 我对你快没耐心了。

en: I don't know what to make of your actions.
zh: 我真不知道该怎么看你这些举动。

en: Your method is different from mine.
zh: 你的方法跟我的不一样。

en: You're on the right track.
zh: 你的路子走对了。

en: What you did is against the rules.
zh: 你做的事违反规定了。

en: Your time is up.
zh: 你的时间到了。

en: It was very hard for me to find your flat.
zh: 我费了好大劲才找到你住的公寓。

en: Look about you.
zh: 看看你周围。

en: I blush for your mistake.
zh: 我替你犯的错感到脸红。

en: I'll give you anything that you want.
zh: 你想要什么我都会给你。

en: What's new with you? How is your new job working out?
zh: 最近怎么样？新工作还顺利吗？

en: You have the advantage of me.
zh: 你比我有优势。

en: Can I use your pen?
zh: 我能用一下你的笔吗？

en: Your pen is better than mine.
zh: 你的笔比我的好。

en: As you make your bed, so you must lie in it.
zh: 自作自受。

en: Your plan sounds great.
zh: 你的计划听起来很棒。

en: Your pitching is far superior to mine.
zh: 你投球比我强多了。

en: If I find your passport, I'll call you at once.
zh: 如果我找到了你的护照，我会马上给你打电话。

en: Your tie blends well with your suit.
zh: 你的领带和西装很搭。

en: Your tie has come undone.
zh: 你的领带开了。

en: Your dress is very nice.
zh: 你的裙子很漂亮。

en: I'll give you a call before I visit you.
zh: 我去拜访你之前会先给你打个电话。

en: I'll come to your place.
zh: 我去你那儿。

en: Your team doesn't have a prayer to win the championship game.
zh: 你们队想拿冠军根本没戏。

en: I'm glad that your team won the game.
zh: 很高兴你们队赢了比赛。

en: I have good news in store for you.
zh: 我有好消息要告诉你。

en: I'll make a model plane for you.
zh: 我给你做一个飞机模型。

en: I'm not going out on a limb for you because you never helped me before.
zh: 我不会为你冒险的，毕竟你以前从来没帮过我。

en: Choose such friends as will benefit you.
zh: 要交那些对你有益的朋友。

en: I will do all I can for you.
zh: 我会为你尽全力的。

en: You should keep company with such men as can benefit you.
zh: 你应该多和那些能让你受益的人打交道。

en: Don't be angry with me, for I did it for your sake.
zh: 别生我气，我这么做都是为了你好。

en: I am ready to do anything for you.
zh: 为了你，我什么都愿意做。

en: I will do anything for you.
zh: 我愿意为你做任何事。

en: I'd do any damn thing for you.
zh: 为了你，我什么都豁得出去。

en: I'd jump through hoops for you.
zh: 为了你，我上刀山下火海都行。

en: Your excellent work puts me to shame.
zh: 你做得太棒了，我都自愧不如了。

en: What's the weight of your suitcase?
zh: 你的行李箱有多重？

en: Your joke bears repeating.
zh: 你讲的笑话太逗了，值得再讲一遍。

en: You went too far in your joke.
zh: 你玩笑开得有点过头了。

en: Your shirt is torn. You better put on another shirt.
zh: 你的衬衫破了，最好换一件。

en: Your shirt button is coming off.
zh: 你衬衫上的扣子快掉了。

en: I respect you for what you have done.
zh: 我很佩服你所做的一切。

en: This advice of yours will go a long way toward solving the problem.
zh: 你的这个建议对解决问题大有帮助。

en: We are worried about you.
zh: 我们很担心你。

en: I have absolute trust in you.
zh: 我绝对信任你。

en: Your words make me fear for my life.
zh: 听你这么说，我都开始担心我的命了。

en: What are you fond of?
zh: 你平时喜欢干什么？

en: Is this your glass or your sister's?
zh: 这个杯子是你的还是你姐姐的？

en: Your cake is delicious.
zh: 你做的蛋糕真好吃。

en: How many are there in your class?
zh: 你们班有多少人？

en: Your collar has a stain on it.
zh: 你的领子上有个污渍。

en: Your camera is not as excellent as my camera.
zh: 你的相机没我的好用。

en: Your camera is only half the size of mine.
zh: 你的相机只有我的一半大。

en: Here is your bag.
zh: 这是你的包。

en: I took your umbrella by mistake.
zh: 我拿错你的伞了。

en: You'll get into trouble if your girlfriend finds out the truth.
zh: 要是你女朋友发现真相，你就麻烦了。

en: Your mother is in critical condition.
zh: 你妈妈现在的情况很危险。

en: Your mother must have been beautiful when she was young.
zh: 你妈妈年轻的时候一定是个大美女。

en: We came on account of your sick mother.
zh: 我们是因为你妈妈生病才过来的。

en: I think your father hoped you would go to college.
zh: 我觉得你爸爸以前是希望你能上大学的。

en: I'd like to see your father.
zh: 我想见见你父亲。

en: Your sister looks as noble as if she were a princess.
zh: 你姐姐看起来特别有气质，像个公主一样。

en: Is your uncle still abroad?
zh: 你叔叔还在国外吗？

en: What does your aunt do?
zh: 你阿姨是做什么工作的？

en: Where does your uncle live?
zh: 你叔叔住在哪儿？

en: Thanks to your help, I could succeed.
zh: 多亏了你的帮助，我才成功了。

en: Thanks to you, the job went well.
zh: 多亏了你，工作进展得很顺利。

en: Thanks to you, I spent all my money.
zh: 拜你所赐，我的钱全花光了。

en: Your essay is admirable in regard to style.
zh: 你的文章在文风上很出色。

en: I have no idea what you mean.
zh: 我完全不明白你是什么意思。

en: I'm tired of your everlasting grumbles.
zh: 我听腻了你那没完没了的抱怨。

en: Your chair is identical to mine.
zh: 你的椅子跟我的一模一样。

en: I believe you.
zh: 我相信你。

en: While I understand what you say, I can't agree with you.
zh: 虽然我明白你的意思，但我还是没法认同你。

en: I don't agree with you.
zh: 我不同意你的观点。

en: Is your apartment well maintained?
zh: 你的公寓保养得好吗？

en: Your idea cannot be brand new. I heard about it from another source last year.
zh: 你的想法肯定不是全新的，我去年就听人说过了。

en: Your idea is definitely worth thinking about.
zh: 你的主意绝对值得考虑。

en: I will dry your T-shirt.
zh: 我帮你把T恤弄干。

en: Your T-shirt will dry soon.
zh: 你的T恤很快就干了。

en: I regret that I told you.
zh: 我很后悔告诉你了。

en: I have something to tell you.
zh: 我有件事想跟你说。

en: I was almost afraid to talk to you.
zh: 我刚才都有点不敢跟你说话了。

en: I have some good news for you.
zh: 我有一个好消息要告诉你。

en: I will find you a good doctor.
zh: 我会帮你找个好医生的。

en: I want you to go to the post office.
zh: 我想让你去趟邮局。

en: You can count on the $3,000 I have promised you.
zh: 我答应给你的那三千块钱，你放心好了。

en: I'll make you a model plane.
zh: 我会给你做一个飞机模型。

en: I will forgive him out of consideration.
zh: 出于各方面的考虑，我会原谅他的。

en: I will forgive him out of consideration for you.
zh: 看在你的面子上，我会原谅他的。

en: There's a phone call for you from Akemi.
zh: 有个叫明美的打电话找你。

en: I want you to read this book.
zh: 我想让你读读这本书。

en: Didn't I lend you some books? I'm sure I did.
zh: 我不是借给你几本书吗？我肯定借了。

en: You took the words right out of my mouth.
zh: 你真是说出了我的心里话。

en: What you need is, in a word, patience.
zh: 简单来说，你最需要的就是耐心。

en: All you need is to get a driver's license.
zh: 你只需要考个驾照就行了。

en: I will tell you a secret.
zh: 我要告诉你一个秘密。

en: I have a message for you from her.
zh: 她有话让我转告你。

en: You can't have understood what he said.
zh: 你肯定没听懂他在说什么。

en: I feel for you.
zh: 我懂你的感受。

en: I cannot help you, not but that I pity you.
zh: 我帮不了你，虽然我也挺同情你的。

en: I'll boil you the beans.
zh: 我给你煮点豆子吃。

en: I refuse to be treated like a slave by you.
zh: 我拒绝被你当成奴隶一样对待。

en: Your telegram arrived just as I was about to telephone you.
zh: 我正准备给你打电话，你的电报就到了。

en: You are wanted on the phone.
zh: 有你的电话。

en: I couldn't call you; the telephone was out of order.
zh: 我没法给你打电话，电话坏了。

en: I must offer you an apology for coming late.
zh: 我必须为我的迟到向你道歉。

en: I'll lend it to you.
zh: 我借给你。

en: I look around but it's you I can't replace.
zh: 看了一圈，谁也替代不了你。

en: You shall have a nice present.
zh: 我会送你一件精美的礼物。

en: Do you know good from evil?
zh: 你能分清好坏吗？

en: We'll give you your revenge.
zh: 我们会让你报仇的。

en: Dozens of letters are awaiting you.
zh: 有好几十封信等着你呢。

en: I'll make you a new suit.
zh: 我会给你做一套新西服。

en: Let me give you a bit of advice.
zh: 让我给你提个建议吧。

en: I will never forget seeing you.
zh: 我永远不会忘记见到你的那一刻。

en: I ordered you to get out.
zh: 我命令你出去。

en: I was going to write to you, but I was too busy.
zh: 我本来想给你写信的，但我太忙了。

en: Who is that girl waving to you?
zh: 那个冲你招手的女孩是谁？

en: I'll teach you how to drive a car.
zh: 我教你开车。

en: I would like you to go instead of me.
zh: 我想让你替我去。

en: I'll lend you my notebook.
zh: 我的笔记本借给你。

en: I'm adamant that you should go.
zh: 我坚持要求你去。

en: I can only say that I agree with you.
zh: 我只能说我同意你的看法。

en: I want you to go.
zh: 我想让你去。

en: I have been reflecting on what you said to me.
zh: 我一直在思考你跟我说的话。

en: I wanted to show it to you.
zh: 我之前就想拿给你看的。

en: I am counting on you to deliver the opening address.
zh: 我就指望你来做开幕致辞了。

en: I waited outside on the chance of seeing you.
zh: 我在外面等着，就希望能碰见你。

en: I'm very glad to see you.
zh: 见到你我真高兴。

en: I am looking forward to seeing you.
zh: 我很期待见到你。

en: It's always delightful to see you.
zh: 每次见到你都很开心。

en: To see you is always a great pleasure.
zh: 能见到你总是件令人愉快的事。

en: I was chagrined at missing you.
zh: 没见到你，我挺懊恼的。

en: How I've missed you!
zh: 我多想你啊！

en: I'll tell you how to swim.
zh: 我来教你怎么游泳。

en: I would like you to come with me.
zh: 我想让你跟我一起来。

en: There is a piece of good news for you.
zh: 有个好消息要告诉你。

en: You are in part responsible for it.
zh: 这事儿你也有部分责任。

en: I want you to work harder.
zh: 我想让你再努力点。

en: I want to see you again.
zh: 我想再见到你。

en: I'm leaving it to you.
zh: 这事就交给你了。

en: You have a bright future.
zh: 你前途无量。

en: He couldn't be good for you.
zh: 他这种人对你没好处。

en: You have no cause for anger.
zh: 你没理由生气。

en: You've got nothing to complain of.
zh: 你没什么好抱怨的。

en: You shall want for nothing.
zh: 你什么都不会缺的。

en: I feel indebted to you for your help during my illness.
zh: 我生病时你帮了我，我很感激。

en: You have knowledge and experience as well.
zh: 你既有知识，又有经验。

en: What seems simple to you seems complex to me.
zh: 你觉得简单的事，我倒觉得挺复杂的。

en: I take my hat off to you.
zh: 我真佩服你。

en: I want you to be the next Soseki.
zh: 我希望你能成为下一个漱石。

en: You have as much right as everyone else.
zh: 你和其他人一样有权利。

en: You have a tendency to talk too fast.
zh: 你说话容易太快。

en: Life lies in front of you.
zh: 大好前程还在后头呢。

en: Don't you have a sense of justice?
zh: 你就没有一点正义感吗？

en: You have many caring friends.
zh: 你有很多关心你的朋友。

en: You are very trying to me sometimes.
zh: 你有时真让我受不了。

en: I expect you to be punctual.
zh: 我希望你能守时。

en: You got me!
zh: 你难倒我了。

en: Can't you understand the pain of your parents?
zh: 你就不能体谅一下父母的痛苦吗？

en: There is nothing wrong with you.
zh: 你没什么问题。

en: You have a gift for music.
zh: 你有音乐天赋。

en: I can't lie to you.
zh: 我没法对你撒谎。

en: I can't hide the fact from you.
zh: 这事儿我瞒不了你。

en: You make me feel so guilty.
zh: 你让我感到很内疚。

en: I've given up on you!
zh: 我不管你了！

en: You have the advantage of a good education.
zh: 受过良好教育是你的优势。

en: I expect you to work harder.
zh: 我希望你更努力一点。

en: There are few high-ranking positions left open for you.
zh: 没剩下多少高层职位留给你了。

en: You are entitled to try once again.
zh: 你有权再试一次。

en: You are hopeless.
zh: 你没救了。

en: You have a good friend in me.
zh: 我是你的好朋友。

en: I bear no grudge against you.
zh: 我对你没成见。

en: I'm afraid this job is too much for you.
zh: 恐怕这活儿你干不下来。

en: I expect you know all about it.
zh: 我想你应该已经全知道了。

en: You have no business doing it.
zh: 你没权利这么做。

en: You deserve the prize.
zh: 这奖是你该得的。

en: You have no right to say so.
zh: 你没权利这么说。

en: I take my hat off to you!
zh: 我真佩服你！

en: I blush for you.
zh: 我替你感到害臊。

en: Green suits you.
zh: 绿色挺适合你的。

en: I am disgusted with you.
zh: 你真让我恶心。

en: I can't thank you enough.
zh: 我简直感激不尽。

en: You seem to be insensible of their good intentions.
zh: 你好像根本没领会到人家的好意。

en: You have no right to oppose our plan.
zh: 你没权利反对我们的计划。

en: All you can do is to wait.
zh: 你只能等着了。

en: I can't keep up with you.
zh: 我跟不上你了。

en: I'd like to talk with you in private.
zh: 我想单独和你谈谈。

en: I have a very sore arm where you hit me.
zh: 被你打到的地方，我胳膊疼得厉害。

en: How can you say that?
zh: 你怎么能这么说呢？

en: You should have seen it.
zh: 你真该亲眼看看。

en: I'll stand behind you if you are going to do it.
zh: 你要是真打算做，我会支持你的。

en: I guess that you can't do it.
zh: 我觉得你搞不定。

en: We want you to sing the song.
zh: 我们想听你唱这首歌。

en: I hope you have brains enough to see the difference.
zh: 我希望你够聪明，能看出这其中的区别。

en: Didn't I tell you so?
zh: 我不是早就跟你说过了吗？

en: When you put it so strongly, I can't say I don't agree.
zh: 你既然说得这么绝，我也没法不同意。

en: I'm anxious to see you.
zh: 我急着想见你。

en: You shall have a reward.
zh: 少不了你的奖励。

en: I'll lend you this book.
zh: 这本书我借给你。

en: I'll give you this pendant.
zh: 这个挂坠送给你。

en: I'll give you this camera.
zh: 这个相机送你了。

en: I'll give you this money.
zh: 这些钱给你。

en: Never did I dream of meeting you here.
zh: 我做梦也没想到会在这儿碰到你。

en: It is quite a surprise to see you here.
zh: 在这儿见到你太让人意外了。

en: I little dreamed of seeing you here.
zh: 我压根儿没想到会在这儿见到你。

en: You play the guitar quite like a professional, don't you?
zh: 你吉他弹得跟专业人士似的，是吧？

en: Let me give you some advice.
zh: 我给你提个建议吧。

en: I'll treat you.
zh: 我请客。

en: I have a nice present to give you.
zh: 我有个好礼物要送给你。

en: Can you do that?
zh: 你能做到吗？

en: I never see you but I think of my brother.
zh: 我一见到你就会想起我兄弟。

en: I owe you ten dollars.
zh: 我欠你十块钱。

en: A thousand yen is owed to you.
zh: 还欠你一千日元。

en: You should not play a joke on me.
zh: 你别拿我开玩笑。

en: Do your work in your own way.
zh: 按你自己的方式去做吧。

en: I thought you'd be the last person to do such a thing.
zh: 我原以为你是最不可能做出这种事的人。

en: If I were you, I'd be able to succeed.
zh: 我要是你，早就成功了。

en: You can make it! Go for it. I'll stand by you.
zh: 你可以的！加油，我会一直支持你的。

en: You deserve to succeed.
zh: 这是你应得的成功。

en: You could get into the Guinness Book of World Records as the heaviest drinker.
zh: 凭你这酒量，都能上吉尼斯纪录了。

en: I can't think of life without you.
zh: 我没法想象没有你的生活。

en: It's not the time but the will that you lack.
zh: 你缺的不是时间，而是意志力。

en: You and I are good friends.
zh: 咱俩是好朋友。

en: You and I are the same age.
zh: 咱俩一样大。

en: Is it right that you and I should fight?
zh: 咱俩打架合适吗？

en: Beside you, I'm only a beginner at this game.
zh: 跟你比起来，我玩这游戏也就是个菜鸟。

en: What's your relation with him?
zh: 你跟他什么关系？

en: I am not to blame any more than you are.
zh: 我没责任，你也一样。

en: He, just like you, is a good golfer.
zh: 他和你一样，高尔夫球打得很好。

en: I as well as you am to blame.
zh: 我和你都有责任。

en: I am not excited any more than you are.
zh: 我跟你一样，一点儿都不兴奋。

en: I as well as you was late for school yesterday.
zh: 昨天我和你上学都迟到了。

en: I share your idea.
zh: 我和你想法一样。

en: I bought the same shirt as yours.
zh: 我买了件跟你一样的衬衫。

en: He is no more a fool than you are.
zh: 他跟你一样都不傻。

en: If only I could speak English as fluently as you!
zh: 要是我英语能说得像你一样流利就好了！

en: You and I are very good friends.
zh: 咱俩是特别好的朋友。

en: There is a fundamental difference between your opinion and mine.
zh: 咱俩的观点有本质的区别。

en: Either you or I have to go there.
zh: 咱俩之间得去一个。

en: It is hard to distinguish you from your brother.
zh: 很难把你和你兄弟分清楚。

en: I feel relaxed with you.
zh: 跟你在一起我挺放松的。

en: I'll take my chances with you.
zh: 我想跟你一起碰碰运气。

en: I'd like to go with you, but as it is I can't.
zh: 我想跟你去，但现在去不了。

en: I'd like to go to the seaside with you.
zh: 我想和你去海边。

en: I wish I could go to the party with you.
zh: 真希望我能跟你一起去聚会。

en: It is a great pleasure being with you.
zh: 跟你在一起很开心。

en: I beg to differ, as I disagree with your analysis of the situation.
zh: 我有不同意见，我不同意你对局势的分析。

en: It pains me to disagree with your opinion.
zh: 虽然很遗憾，但我不能同意你的看法。

en: Listen, um, I was wondering, what are you and Molly doing tonight?
zh: 那个，我在想，你和莫莉今晚干什么？

en: You and I are good friends, but we have little in common.
zh: 咱俩是好朋友，但没什么共同点。

en: I'm leaving you tomorrow.
zh: 我明天就离开你了。

en: I often think about the place where I met you.
zh: 我经常想起咱俩见面的那个地方。

en: I would like to go to the concert with you.
zh: 我想和你一起去听音乐会。

en: He'll be sure to smell a rat if I'm with you.
zh: 如果我跟你在一起，他肯定会起疑心的。

en: I would prefer to speak to you in private.
zh: 我想和你单独聊聊。

en: You really are hopeless.
zh: 你真没救了。

en: You two are the nucleus of the team.
zh: 你们俩是团队的核心。

en: I'll get something to drink for both of you.
zh: 我去给你们俩拿点儿喝的。

en: I don't like both of you going to such a place.
zh: 我不喜欢你们两个人都去那种地方。

en: There is enough bread for all of you.
zh: 面包够你们大家吃的了。

en: Divide the cake among you three.
zh: 蛋糕你们三个人分了吧。

en: You students are supposed to be diligent.
zh: 你们学生应该勤奋点。

en: How old will you be next year?
zh: 你明年多大？

en: You had better not start until they arrive.
zh: 最好等他们到了你再开始。

en: You should pay attention to his story.
zh: 你该听听他的故事。

en: You must not smoke till you grow up.
zh: 你成年之前不能抽烟。

en: What are you learning from the teacher?
zh: 你在跟老师学什么？

en: You are young boys.
zh: 你们还是小伙子呢。

en: You belong to the next generation.
zh: 你们属于下一代。

en: You may swim now.
zh: 你现在可以去游泳了。

en: You are to hand in your assignments by Monday.
zh: 你们周一得交作业。

en: You didn't need to hurry.
zh: 你本来不用那么赶的。

en: You must conform to the rules.
zh: 你得遵守规则。

en: All of you did good work.
zh: 你们大家都干得不错。

en: What do you learn at school?
zh: 你在学校学什么？

en: You should try to be more polite.
zh: 你该礼貌一点。

en: All of you are diligent.
zh: 你们都很勤奋。

en: You must start at once.
zh: 你得马上开始。

en: It is imperative for you to act at once.
zh: 你必须立刻采取行动。

en: You must study hard and learn many things.
zh: 你得好好学习，多学点东西。

en: All you have to do is to learn this sentence by heart.
zh: 你只要把这句话背下来就行了。

en: Are you students at this school?
zh: 你们是这个学校的学生吗？

en: You have to share the cake equally.
zh: 你们得平分这块蛋糕。

en: You should know what to read.
zh: 你应该知道该读什么。

en: Compare your translation with the one on the blackboard.
zh: 把你的翻译跟黑板上的对比一下。

en: Compare your sentence with the one on the blackboard.
zh: 把你的句子跟黑板上的比一比。

en: Who is your teacher?
zh: 你的老师是谁？

en: What was the cause of your quarrel?
zh: 你们是因为什么吵架的？

en: I don't approve your decision.
zh: 我不赞成你的决定。

en: I wonder which of you will win.
zh: 我在想你们中谁会赢。

en: There are merits and demerits to both your opinions so I'm not going to decide right away which to support.
zh: 你们两人的意见各有优缺点，所以我现在还没法决定支持谁。

en: Your team is stronger than ours.
zh: 你们队比我们队强。

en: Any of you can do it.
zh: 你们谁都能做这件事。

en: Which of you came here first?
zh: 你们中谁先来的？

en: Did any of you gentlemen wait on this man?
zh: 先生们，请问你们有谁接待过这位先生吗？

en: I think I might join you, but I haven't decided yet.
zh: 我觉得我也许会加入你们，但我还没决定。

en: You've got no alibi for the day of the murder.
zh: 案发那天你没有不在场证明。

en: Just as you treat me, so I will treat you.
zh: 你怎么对我，我就怎么对你。

en: If you're going to the beach, count me in.
zh: 如果你要去海边，算我一个。

en: When will you complete the preparations?
zh: 你什么时候能准备好？

en: Boys, don't make any noise.
zh: 孩子们，别吵。

en: All you have to do is wait.
zh: 你只要等着就行。

en: Not only you but I also was to blame.
zh: 不只是你，我也该负责。

en: Not only you but also he is ignorant of the truth.
zh: 不光是你，他也对真相一无所知。

en: He as well as you likes baseball.
zh: 他和你一样喜欢棒球。

en: Not only are you wrong, but I am wrong too.
zh: 不仅你错了，我也错了。

en: We are both to blame.
zh: 我们两个都有责任。

en: You are not the only one responsible for it, I am too.
zh: 这件事不光是你一个人的责任，我也有份。

en: Only you answered the question.
zh: 只有你回答了那个问题。

en: Only you can carry the bag.
zh: 只有你能拎得动那个包。

en: What a memory you have.
zh: 你的记性真好。

en: You're the only one who can do it.
zh: 只有你能做到。

en: I'm quite all right if you have no objection to it.
zh: 如果你没意见，我就没问题。

en: You are the man I've been looking for.
zh: 你就是我要找的那个人。

en: You're the best man for the job.
zh: 你是这份工作的最佳人选。

en: Don't you move from here.
zh: 你别离开这儿。

en: I hadn't recognized the importance of this document until you told me about it.
zh: 直到你跟我说，我才意识到这份文件的重要性。

en: I was disappointed at your absence.
zh: 你没来让我挺失望的。

en: Well may you ask why!
zh: 你确实该问问为什么！

en: I had been to the hospital before you came.
zh: 在你来之前我就已经去过医院了。

en: I took it for granted that you would come.
zh: 我原以为你肯定会来。

en: I had no idea that you were coming.
zh: 我完全不知道你要来。

en: It doesn't matter whether you come or not.
zh: 你来不来都没关系。

en: It does not matter to me whether you come or not.
zh: 对我来说，你来不来都无所谓。

en: It's a pity that you can't come.
zh: 很可惜你来不了。

en: What is it that you want?
zh: 你到底想要什么？

en: I want you.
zh: 我要你。

en: Either you or your friend is wrong.
zh: 不是你错了，就是你朋友错了。

en: I'm amazed by the ease with which you solve the problem.
zh: 我真佩服你这么轻而易举就解决了这个问题。

en: I will have left when you return.
zh: 你回来的时候，我肯定已经走了。

en: He will have left here by the time you return.
zh: 你回来的时候，他肯定已经离开这儿了。

en: I will have left here before you return.
zh: 在你回来之前，我就已经离开这儿了。

en: I take it from your silence that you are not satisfied with my answer.
zh: 看你一声不吭，估计你是不太满意我的回答。

en: We thought we would write out the directions, in case you got lost.
zh: 我们想着把路线写下来，省得你迷路。

en: I want to know if you'll be free tomorrow.
zh: 我想知道你明天有没有空。

en: I am glad that you have returned safe.
zh: 很高兴你平安回来了。

en: What would you do if you were in my place?
zh: 要是换做你是我，你会怎么办？

en: I would like you to think about what you would have done in my place.
zh: 我想让你设身处地想一下，如果你是我，你会怎么做。

en: What would you do in my place?
zh: 换做是你，你会怎么办？

en: That you don't believe me is a great pity.
zh: 你不相信我，真是太可惜了。

en: The information you gave me is of little use.
zh: 你提供给我的信息没啥用。

en: You or I will be chosen.
zh: 要么选你，要么选我。

en: Either you or I am wrong.
zh: 不是你错了，就是我错了。

en: It is not necessary for you to take his advice if you don't want to.
zh: 你要是真不想听他的建议，也没必要非得听。

en: If you're busy, I'll help you.
zh: 你要是忙，我来帮你。

en: Didn't they teach you common sense as well as typing at the school where you studied?
zh: 你上学那会儿，除了教打字，学校没教过你点常识吗？

en: I noticed you entering my room.
zh: 我看到你进我房间了。

en: Never did I dream that you would lose.
zh: 我做梦也没想到你会输。

en: I will lend you whatever book you need.
zh: 你需要什么书，我都可以借给你。

en: I need you.
zh: 我需要你。

en: You do not necessarily have to go there yourself.
zh: 你不一定非得亲自去。

en: You did well to keep the secret.
zh: 这个秘密你守得挺好。

en: Whether you like her or not, you can't marry her.
zh: 不管你喜不喜欢她，你都不能跟她结婚。

en: I don't know whether you like her or not.
zh: 我不知道你喜不喜欢她。

en: It is not good that you did not ask her name.
zh: 你没问她的名字，这可不太好。

en: It is cruel of you to find fault with her.
zh: 你老是挑她的刺，也太刻薄了。

en: What you said to her isn't accepted as a joke.
zh: 你对她说的那话，可不能当成是玩笑。

en: Either you or she has to go there.
zh: 不是你去，就是她去。

en: As you have insulted him, he is cross with you.
zh: 因为你羞辱了他，他在生你的气。

en: We thought it wrong that you should punish him.
zh: 我们觉得你不该惩罚他。

en: It is no use your waiting for him.
zh: 你等他也白等。

en: It is no use your trying to persuade him.
zh: 你劝他也白搭。

en: Does he know that you love him?
zh: 他知道你爱他吗？

en: Imagine yourself to be in his place.
zh: 你换位思考下，站在他的立场想想。

en: You did well not to follow his advice.
zh: 你没听他的建议，做得对。

en: It was foolish of you to accept his offer.
zh: 你答应了他的提议，真是太蠢了。

en: You did wrong to refuse his help.
zh: 你不该拒绝他的帮助。

en: Either you or he is wrong.
zh: 不是你错了，就是他错了。

en: Either you or he has to attend the meeting.
zh: 要么你去开会，要么他去。

en: It was wise of you to ask him for help.
zh: 你找他帮忙真是个明智的决定。

en: You are quite justified in answering him back.
zh: 你回怼他是完全有道理的。

en: Whatever you said to him made him feel better.
zh: 不管你对他说了什么，反正他现在感觉好多了。

en: I can't approve of your going out with him.
zh: 我不同意你跟他出去。

en: I cannot approve of your going out with him.
zh: 我坚决不同意你跟他出去。

en: I don't approve of your going out with him.
zh: 我不赞成你跟他出去。

en: Either you are right or he is.
zh: 不是你对，就是他对。

en: Show me what you bought.
zh: 给我看下你买了什么。

en: How much is the car you are planning to buy?
zh: 你打算买的那辆车多少钱？

en: I saw you with a tall boy.
zh: 我看见你跟一个高个儿男生在一起。

en: He is no more foolish than you are.
zh: 他并不比你笨。

en: It is amazing that you won the prize.
zh: 你居然拿奖了，真厉害。

en: It's a pity that you should leave Japan.
zh: 你要离开日本了，真可惜。

en: I'll take over your duties while you are away from Japan.
zh: 你不在日本的时候，你的工作由我来接管。

en: I am going to do it whether you agree or not.
zh: 不管你同不同意，我都要做。

en: I don't object to your going out to work, but who will look after the children?
zh: 我不反对你出去工作，但谁来照顾孩子呢？

en: I'm very happy you'll be visiting Tokyo next month.
zh: 听说你下个月要来东京，我太开心了。

en: You have good reason to be angry.
zh: 你确实有理由生气。

en: The success resulted from your efforts.
zh: 这次成功全靠你的努力。

en: We were just talking about you when you called.
zh: 你打电话过来的时候，我们正好聊到你呢。

en: It is difficult for you to climb to the mountaintop.
zh: 你想爬上山顶还挺不容易的。

en: It's quite plain that you haven't been paying attention.
zh: 很明显，你刚才根本没专心。

en: Your advice led me to success.
zh: 听了你的建议，我才成功的。

en: It is a pity that you can't join us.
zh: 你不能来，真是太可惜了。

en: You had better not wake me up when you come in.
zh: 你进来的时候最好别把我吵醒。

en: I sincerely hope that you will soon recover from your illness.
zh: 真心希望你的病能快点好。

en: Unless you make a decision quickly, the opportunity will be lost.
zh: 你要是不赶紧做决定，机会可就溜走了。

en: I hope that you will get well soon.
zh: 希望你早日康复。

en: I found the very thing you had been looking for.
zh: 我把你一直找的那个东西给找着了。

en: It is plain that you have done this before.
zh: 一看就知道你以前干过这活儿。

en: I don't care whichever you choose.
zh: 你选哪个我都无所谓。

en: It is not surprising that you should be scolded by your teacher.
zh: 你被老师训了一顿，这没什么好奇怪的。

en: You speak first; I will speak after.
zh: 你先说，我待会儿再说。

en: Well do I remember the day you were born.
zh: 你出生的那天，我还记得清清楚楚。

en: I guess you are right.
zh: 我想你是对的。

en: If you are honest, I will hire you.
zh: 只要你为人诚实，我就录用你。

en: Do what you think is right.
zh: 觉得对就去做吧。

en: Your success depends on your efforts.
zh: 你能不能成功就看你努不努力了。

en: Whether you will succeed or not depends on your efforts.
zh: 成不成功全看你自己努不努力。

en: I'm so glad that you succeeded.
zh: 看到你成功了，我真为你高兴。

en: I am glad that you have succeeded.
zh: 你成功了，我真替你高兴。

en: I'm glad to hear of your success.
zh: 听说你成功了，我很高兴。

en: It's to your credit that you told the truth.
zh: 你能说实话，这点做得很好。

en: What happened to the girl you were sharing the bedroom with?
zh: 之前跟你同屋的那个女孩后来怎么样了？

en: I should be glad if you got the job.
zh: 要是你拿到了那份工作，我真替你高兴。

en: You may or may not win.
zh: 你能不能赢还不一定。

en: I will do it on the condition that you help me.
zh: 只要你肯帮我，我就去做。

en: If it were not for your help, I might have failed.
zh: 要不是你帮忙，我可能已经失败了。

en: Thanks to your help, I could understand the book quite well.
zh: 多亏了你帮忙，我才把这本书看明白了。

en: Your o's look like a's.
zh: 你写的 o 看着跟 a 似的。

en: They will have arrived there before you start.
zh: 等你出发的时候，他们估计都已经到了。

en: He came after you left.
zh: 他是在你走之后才来的。

en: You must do your homework at once.
zh: 赶紧写作业去。

en: Who took care of the dog while you were away?
zh: 你不在的时候，谁在照顾那条狗？

en: I will wait till you have written the letter.
zh: 我等你把信写完。

en: It is strange that you should fail.
zh: 你居然会失败，真是奇了怪了。

en: You may fail, for all I care.
zh: 你爱失败不失败，我才不在乎呢。

en: The reason why you failed is you did not try hard enough.
zh: 你失败的原因就是你不够努力。

en: When you speak of a pay-raise before recognition, I am inclined to think you are putting the cart before the horse.
zh: 你还没做出成绩就谈加薪，我觉得你是本末倒置。

en: A time will come when you will regret your action.
zh: 总有一天你会为你做的事后悔的。

en: You may as well go yourself.
zh: 你还是自己去吧。

en: You should talk to the teacher yourself.
zh: 你应该自己去跟老师谈谈。

en: You talk next and you be quiet.
zh: 接下来该你说了，你安静点。

en: We heard the news that you had passed the exam.
zh: 我们听说你考试通过了。

en: I think it's a pity you could not come to our party.
zh: 你没能来参加我们的派对，我觉得挺可惜的。

en: I don't like you any more than you like me.
zh: 我不喜欢你，就像你不喜欢我一样。

en: I love you more than you love me.
zh: 我爱你胜过你爱我。

en: Either you or I must go in his place.
zh: 要么你去，要么我去，总得有人替他。

en: What's the reason that made you call me?
zh: 你给我打电话是有什么事吗？

en: What is it that you want me to do?
zh: 你到底想让我做什么？

en: I can't thank you enough for what you did for me.
zh: 我真不知道该怎么谢你才好。

en: I hope you will join us in the parade and march along the street.
zh: 我希望你能加入我们的游行队伍，一起上街。

en: I wish you could come with us.
zh: 要是你能跟我们一起来就好了。

en: I'll look after your affairs when you are dead.
zh: 你走了以后，你的后事我会替你打理的。

en: I don't have as much money as you think.
zh: 我没你想的那么有钱。

en: How much money did you spend in total?
zh: 你一共花了多少钱？

en: Can you account for all the money you spent?
zh: 你能交待清楚钱都花在哪儿了吗？

en: I will wait until you have finished your homework.
zh: 我会等你写完作业。

en: It makes no difference whether you agree or not.
zh: 不管你同不同意，结果都一样。

en: With your approval, I would like to offer him the job.
zh: 只要你同意，我想把这份工作交给他。

en: It was wise of you to take your umbrella with you.
zh: 你带了伞真是太明智了。

en: Show me the doll that you bought yesterday.
zh: 给我看看你昨天买的那个娃娃。

en: Nothing is so tasty as the dish you make.
zh: 什么都没有你做的菜好吃。

en: I'll help you so long as you do your best.
zh: 只要你尽力，我就会帮你。

en: Choose the color you like the best.
zh: 挑个你最喜欢的颜色吧。

en: The paint on the seat on which you are sitting is still wet.
zh: 你坐的这把椅子油漆还没干呢。

en: It makes little difference whether you go today or tomorrow.
zh: 你今天去还是明天去，没什么区别。

en: It will not make much difference whether you go today or tomorrow.
zh: 你今天去还是明天去，影响都不大。

en: Your mother has made you what you are.
zh: 是你母亲成就了今天的你。

en: What you've just told me chimes in with what I heard yesterday.
zh: 你刚才跟我说的和我昨天听到的正好对上了。

en: What you need the most now is courage.
zh: 你现在最需要的是勇气。

en: This is all you have to do now.
zh: 这就是你现在要做的全部。

en: It is necessary for you to go and encourage the girl.
zh: 你有必要去鼓励一下那个女孩。

en: It makes no difference whether you go or not.
zh: 你去不去都无所谓。

en: You don't need to go unless you want to.
zh: 除非你自己想去，否则没必要去。

en: If you don't go, I won't, either.
zh: 你不去，我也不去。

en: You don't have to go unless you want to.
zh: 你不想去的话就不用去。

en: I don't care as long as you are happy.
zh: 只要你开心，我怎么样都行。

en: Your meaning is beyond me.
zh: 我不明白你的意思。

en: What you have said applies only to single women.
zh: 你说的这些只适用于单身女性。

en: What you said surprised me.
zh: 你说的话让我很吃惊。

en: Whatever you may say, I won't give it up.
zh: 不管你怎么说，我都不会放弃的。

en: The picture you are looking at is a copy of a Picasso.
zh: 你在看的这张画是毕加索作品的复制品。

en: The picture you are looking at costs 100,000 yen.
zh: 你在看的这张画要十万日元。

en: What I can't make out is why you have changed your mind.
zh: 我就是搞不懂你为什么要改变主意。

en: I'll make allowances for your lack of experience.
zh: 我会考虑到你经验不足的。

en: By the time you get out of jail, she'll probably have gotten married.
zh: 等你出狱的时候，她可能都已经结婚了。
